name: Fast Future
overview: This is an arcade type game where you take control of your craft and guide it around a circuit a set number of times, avoiding other craft and blasting them with your twin lasers if they won't get out of the way. Bumping them off the track if they get too close. Banks, gravity tracks, collecting energy shells, 32 levels of fast fun created by Paul Black and published in Commodore User Disk - Games Disk 2 (1991).
